video:video.video:title: The AMQP 1.0 Protocol - 6/6 - Composite Types and Messages
video:video.video:description: This is the final part of a 6 part series introducing the AMQP 1.0 protocol, covering composite types and messages, and the frame layout. The AMQP 1.0 protocol is used by Azure Service Bus, Service&#8230;

video:video.video:title: The AMQP 1.0 Protocol - 5/6 - Primitive Type Encoding
video:video.video:description: This is part 5 of a 6 part series introducing the AMQP 1.0 protocol, explaining the type system basics and the encoding of primitive types. The AMQP 1.0 protocol is used by Azure Service Bus, Service&#8230;

video:video.video:title: The AMQP 1.0 Protocol - 4/6 - Flow Control
video:video.video:description: This is part 4 of a 6 part series introducing the AMQP 1.0 protocol, describing the flow control models. The AMQP 1.0 protocol is used by Azure Service Bus, Service Bus for Windows Server, Azure Event&#8230;

video:video.video:title: The AMQP 1.0 Protocol - 3/6 - Message Transfers
video:video.video:description: This is part 3 of a 6 part series introducing the AMQP 1.0 protocol, describing message transfers and disposition. The AMQP 1.0 protocol is used by Azure Service Bus, Service Bus for Windows Server,&#8230;

video:video.video:title: The AMQP 1.0 Protocol - 2/6 - Core Elements
video:video.video:description: This is part 2 of a 6 part series introducing the AMQP 1.0 protocol, discussing the core protocol elements, Connections, Sessions, and Links. The AMQP 1.0 protocol is used by Azure Service Bus,&#8230;

video:video.video:title: The AMQP 1.0 Protocol - 1/6 - Overview
video:video.video:description: This is part 1 of a 6 part series introducing the AMQP 1.0 protocol. Part 1 - Part 2 - Part 3 - Part 4 - Part 5 - Part 6 The AMQP 1.0 protocol is used by Azure Service Bus, Service Bus for Windows&#8230;
